taxi.service

Class RegistrationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • taxi.service.RegistrationService

  • public class RegistrationService
extends java.lang.Object
    The RegistrationService class implements the functions regarding customer, taxi and taxi driver registration.
    Since:
    Academic Year 2016-2017
    Author:
    Team 4

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegistrationService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Taxi createTaxi(java.lang.String carModel, java.lang.String carType, java.lang.String licensePlate, java.lang.String carModelDate, double locationLat, double locationLon)
      createTaxi method This method gets as parameters: the carModel the carType the licensePlate the carModelDate the latitude the longtitude The method: Validates the license plate Validates the car model date Creates the new taxi object and inserts it in the DB Finally it returns the new object Note: It is assumed that coordinates are fetched from GPS
      Customer registerCustomer(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String sex, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.util.Date dateOfBirth, double locationLat, double locationLon, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String city, int zipCode, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String creditCardType, java.lang.String creditCardNumber, java.lang.String expiryDate, java.lang.String ccv)
      registerCustomer method This method gets as parameters: the name the surname the sex the username the password the dateOfBirth the latitude the longtitude the address the city the zipCode the email the creditCardType the creditCardNumber the expiryDate the ccv The method: Validates username Validates password and then encrypts it Validates email Validates credit card Validates date of birth Creates the new customer object and inserts it in the DB Finally it returns the new object Note: It is assumed that coordinates are fetched from GPS
      TaxiDriver registerTaxiDriver(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String sex, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.util.Date dateOfBirth, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String city, int zipCode, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String creditCardType, java.lang.String creditCardNumber, java.lang.String expiryDate, java.lang.String ccv, Taxi owns)
      registerTaxiDriver method This method gets as parameters: the name the surname the sex the username the password the dateOfBirth the address the city the zipCode the email the creditCardType the creditCardNumber the expiryDate the ccv the taxi he owns The method: Validates username Validates password and then encrypts it Validates email Validates credit card Validates date of birth Validates that the taxi is not already defined from other driver Creates the new taxi driver object and inserts it in the DB Finally it returns the new object

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createTaxi

        public Taxi createTaxi(java.lang.String carModel,
                       java.lang.String carType,
                       java.lang.String licensePlate,
                       java.lang.String carModelDate,
                       double locationLat,
                       double locationLon)
        createTaxi method This method gets as parameters:
        • the carModel
        • the carType
        • the licensePlate
        • the carModelDate
        • the latitude
        • the longtitude
        The method:
        • Validates the license plate
        • Validates the car model date
        • Creates the new taxi object and inserts it in the DB
        • Finally it returns the new object
        Note: It is assumed that coordinates are fetched from GPS
        Parameters:
        carModel - type String
        carType - type String
        licensePlate - type String
        carModelDate - type String
        latitude - type double
        longtitude - type double
        Returns:
        Taxi

      • registerCustomer

        public Customer registerCustomer(java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String surname,
                                 java.lang.String sex,
                                 java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.String password,
                                 java.util.Date dateOfBirth,
                                 double locationLat,
                                 double locationLon,
                                 java.lang.String address,
                                 java.lang.String city,
                                 int zipCode,
                                 java.lang.String email,
                                 java.lang.String creditCardType,
                                 java.lang.String creditCardNumber,
                                 java.lang.String expiryDate,
                                 java.lang.String ccv)
        registerCustomer method This method gets as parameters:
        • the name
        • the surname
        • the sex
        • the username
        • the password
        • the dateOfBirth
        • the latitude
        • the longtitude
        • the address
        • the city
        • the zipCode
        • the email
        • the creditCardType
        • the creditCardNumber
        • the expiryDate
        • the ccv
        The method:
        • Validates username
        • Validates password and then encrypts it
        • Validates email
        • Validates credit card
        • Validates date of birth
        • Creates the new customer object and inserts it in the DB
        • Finally it returns the new object Note: It is assumed that coordinates are fetched from GPS
        Parameters:
        name - type String
        surname - type String
        sex - type String
        username - type String
        password - type String
        dateOfBirth - type Date
        locationLat - type double
        locationLon - type double
        address - type String
        city - type String
        zipCode - type int
        email - type String
        creditCardType - type String
        creditCardNumber - type String
        expiryDate - type String
        ccv - type String
        owns - type Taxi
        Returns:
        Customer

      • registerTaxiDriver

        public TaxiDriver registerTaxiDriver(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String surname,
                                     java.lang.String sex,
                                     java.lang.String username,
                                     java.lang.String password,
                                     java.util.Date dateOfBirth,
                                     java.lang.String address,
                                     java.lang.String city,
                                     int zipCode,
                                     java.lang.String email,
                                     java.lang.String creditCardType,
                                     java.lang.String creditCardNumber,
                                     java.lang.String expiryDate,
                                     java.lang.String ccv,
                                     Taxi owns)
        registerTaxiDriver method This method gets as parameters:
        • the name
        • the surname
        • the sex
        • the username
        • the password
        • the dateOfBirth
        • the address
        • the city
        • the zipCode
        • the email
        • the creditCardType
        • the creditCardNumber
        • the expiryDate
        • the ccv
        • the taxi he owns
        The method:
        • Validates username
        • Validates password and then encrypts it
        • Validates email
        • Validates credit card
        • Validates date of birth
        • Validates that the taxi is not already defined from other driver
        • Creates the new taxi driver object and inserts it in the DB
        • Finally it returns the new object
        Parameters:
        name - type String
        surname - type String
        sex - type String
        username - type String
        password - type String
        dateOfBirth - type Date
        address - type String
        city - type String
        zipCode - type int
        email - type String

        creditCardNumber - type String
        expiryDate - type String
